get_statement:
-- returns the basic event data for the mobile app sync from the djangoevents cache tables
select 
e.id,
e.code,
e.eva_id,
e.type_code,
e.type,
e.name,
e.city,
e.state,
e.venue,
e.country_code,
e.location,
e.region,
e.start_date,
e.end_date,
e.range_display,
e.tz_identifier,
e.website,
e.status_id,
e.is_published,
(select count(*) from spe_event_data_event_activity_flags eaf where eaf.activity_id = 4 and eaf.event_id = e.id) as exhibitor_cnt,
e.date_modified
from spe_event_data_event e
where
e.send_to_mobile = 1
[and e.date_modified > <modified_after>]
order by e.start_date
limit 3600

-- event_sessions_api is a union query that returns sessions from epms or eweb in that order
SELECT s.* FROM event_sessions_api s
JOIN spe_event_data_event e on e.id = s.event_id
where
-- e.send_to_mobile = 1
1
[and s.modified_date > <modified_after>]
order by e.start_date
limit 3600

SELECT sa.*
from event_sessions_activities_api sa
JOIN spe_event_data_event e on sa.event_id = e.id
where
e.send_to_mobile = 1
[and sa.modified_date > <modified_after>]

SELECT sap.*
FROM event_sessions_activities_people_api sap
JOIN spe_event_data_event e on sap.event_id = e.id
WHERE
-- e.send_to_mobile = 1
sap.event_id = 1150
[AND sap.modified_date > <modified_after>]

SELECT sp.*
FROM event_sessions_people_api sp
JOIN spe_event_data_event e on sp.event_id = e.id
where
e.send_to_mobile = 1
[and sp.modified_date > <modified_after>]

SELECT
        'eweb' as system_code,
        seweb.id
    FROM spe_event_data_session seweb
    JOIN spe_event_data_event e ON seweb.event_id = e.id
    WHERE event_epms_session_count_for_id(seweb.event_id) = 0
    AND (seweb.end_date is null OR coalesce(seweb.end_date, 0) >= curdate())
    AND seweb.is_published = 1 AND e.is_published = 1
    ;

-- detail of a single chapter, for use on Chapter Detail Pages
-- Brett 2020-01-08
SELECT 
substring(c.crm_id,-4) as chapter_id4, c.crm_id as chapter_id7,
c.name, c.established_date, c.url, c.location, c.country_code as country_code3, 
c.in_santioned_country as is_in_sanctioned_country, c.is_active,
substring(r.related_crm_id,-3) as section_id3, r.related_crm_id as section_id7,
s.name as section_name
FROM crm_units c
LEFT JOIN crm_unit_relationships r ON c.crm_id=r.crm_id
LEFT JOIN crm_units s ON s.crm_id=r.related_crm_id
WHERE 1
AND c.class_code ='CHAPTER'
AND c.crm_id=SUBSTR( CONCAT("999", ?), -7)
-- AND lower(c.name) NOT REGEXP '^disestab|do not use|error|no estab|unassigned|unused|unknown'
AND lower(s.name) NOT REGEXP '^disestab|do not use|error|no estab|unassigned|unused|unknown'
LIMIT 1
;
-- sas

-- pass either the standard 4-digit chapter number or its full 7-digit customer number in a query string like 0=5551 or 0=9995551 with a GET request like /chapter/awards and no trailing slash

SELECT name, usr_nominee_year as year 
FROM crm_awards 
WHERE crm_id = SUBSTR( CONCAT("999", ?), -7) and program_type = 'CHAPTER' 
ORDER BY
usr_nominee_year desc,
if(id=72488144,1,0) desc,
name asc

SELECT chapter_id4, chapter_id7, name, is_in_sanctioned_country, country_code3, location FROM v_Chapters_List
WHERE 1
AND section_id7=SUBSTR( CONCAT('9990', ?), -7)
;

-- given a URL, show me the countries (both codes and the conditionally-overridden name)
-- param 1 is either http: or https:
-- param 2 is always just a double slash //
-- param 3 is the host like www.spe.org or rca.spe.org
-- param 4 is the URI path like /europe/ or /en/
select * from v_CountriesRegions where region25_url=concat(?,?,?,?);

-- for a 'region' that rolls up to our /asiapacific/ page, show me the countries (both codes and the conditionally-overridden name)
select * from v_CountriesRegions where region25_url like '%.spe.org/asiapacific/';

-- for a 'region' that rolls up to our /canada/ page, show me the countries (both codes and the conditionally-overridden name)
select * from v_CountriesRegions where region25_url like '%.spe.org/canada/';

-- for a 'region' that rolls up to our /europe/ page, show me the countries (both codes and the conditionally-overridden name)
select * from v_CountriesRegions where region25_url like '%.spe.org/europe/';

-- for a 'region' that rolls up to our /latinamerica/ page, show me the countries (both codes and the conditionally-overridden name)
select * from v_CountriesRegions where region25_url like '%.spe.org/latinamerica/';

-- for a 'region' that rolls up to our /middleeast/ page, show me the countries (both codes and the conditionally-overridden name)
select * from v_CountriesRegions where region25_url like '%.spe.org/middleeast/';

-- for a 'region' that rolls up to our /russia/ page, show me the countries (both codes and the conditionally-overridden name)
select * from v_CountriesRegions where region25_url like 'http://rca%.spe.org/en/';

-- for a 'region' that rolls up to our /unitedstates/ page, show me the countries (both codes and the conditionally-overridden name)
select * from v_CountriesRegions where region25_url like '%.spe.org/unitedstates/';
select manuscript_num as paper_number, title, authors from hse_free_papers
SELECT * FROM v_Events_Archive

SELECT id, code, name, dt_begins, concat(date_format(dt_begins, '%Y%m%d'),'-',date_format(dt_ends, '%Y%m%d')) as i_date_span, date_range as date_span, cfp_info_url, cfp_url, dt_cfp_begins, dt_cfp_ends, location, url, concat(date_format(dt_cfp_ends, '%d %b %Y'),' (',substr(date_format(dt_cfp_ends, '%W'),1,3),')') as due_date, date_format(dt_cfp_ends, '%Y%m%d') as i_cfp_ends
FROM eva_events
WHERE 1
AND ( to_days(dt_cfp_begins) <= (to_days(now())) )
AND ( to_days(dt_cfp_ends) >= (to_days(now())) )
ORDER BY i_cfp_ends
LIMIT 90
;

-- subquery #1 takes the base query for discipline pages' dynamic data, and filters it to only show Conference and Symposium types (i.e., for sidebar item #1) and only for the supplied technical discipline code, which should be D, C, F, P, R, H, I, M
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub1 WHERE 1
AND d_abbrev=UPPER(?) 
AND pert_level IN(1,2)
;

-- subquery #1 takes the base query for discipline pages' dynamic data, and filters it to only show Conference and Symposium types (i.e., for sidebar item #1) and only Drilling
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub1 WHERE 1
AND ((d_abbrev='D' AND pert_level IN(1,2)) OR (substr(pert_d, 1,1) IN(1,2)))
-- AND d_abbrev='D' 
-- AND pert_level IN(1,2)
;

-- subquery #1 takes the base query for discipline pages' dynamic data, and filters it to only show Conference and Symposium types (i.e., for sidebar item #1) and only Completions
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub1 WHERE 1
AND ((d_abbrev='C' AND pert_level IN(1,2)) OR (substr(pert_c, 1,1) IN(1,2)))
-- AND d_abbrev='C'
-- AND pert_level IN(1,2)
;

-- subquery #1 takes the base query for discipline pages' dynamic data, and filters it to only show Conference and Symposium types (i.e., for sidebar item #1) and only Facilities
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub1 WHERE 1
AND ((d_abbrev='F' AND pert_level IN(1,2)) OR (substr(pert_pfc, 1,1) IN(1,2)))
-- AND d_abbrev='F'
-- AND pert_level IN(1,2)
;

-- subquery #1 takes the base query for discipline pages' dynamic data, and filters it to only show Conference and Symposium types (i.e., for sidebar item #1) and only Production
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub1 WHERE 1
AND ((d_abbrev='P' AND pert_level IN(1,2)) OR (substr(pert_po, 1,1) IN(1,2)))
-- AND d_abbrev='P'
-- AND pert_level IN(1,2)
;

-- subquery #1 takes the base query for discipline pages' dynamic data, and filters it to only show Conference and Symposium types (i.e., for sidebar item #1) and only Reservoir
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub1 WHERE 1
AND ((d_abbrev='R' AND pert_level IN(1,2)) OR (substr(pert_rdd, 1,1) IN(1,2)))
-- AND d_abbrev='R'
-- AND pert_level IN(1,2)
;

-- subquery #1 takes the base query for discipline pages' dynamic data, and filters it to only show Conference and Symposium types (i.e., for sidebar item #1) and only Health
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub1 WHERE 1

;

-- subquery #1 takes the base query for discipline pages' dynamic data, and filters it to only show Conference and Symposium types (i.e., for sidebar item #1) and only #7:I:Information
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub1 WHERE 1
AND ((d_abbrev='I' AND pert_level IN(1,2)) OR (substr(pert_mi, 1,1) IN(1,2)))
-- AND d_abbrev='I'
-- AND pert_level IN(1,2)
;

-- subquery #1 takes the base query for discipline pages' dynamic data, and filters it to only show Conference and Symposium types (i.e., for sidebar item #1) and only #8:M:Management
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub1 WHERE 1
AND ((d_abbrev='M' AND pert_level IN(1,2)) OR (substr(pert_mi, 1,1) IN(1,2)))
-- AND d_abbrev='M'
-- AND pert_level IN(1,2)
;

-- subquery #1 takes the base query for discipline pages' dynamic data, and filters it to only show Conference and Symposium types (i.e., for sidebar item #1) and only #8:M:Management
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends 
FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub1 v 
WHERE 1
AND (
((d_abbrev='M' OR d_abbrev='I') AND pert_level IN(1,2)) 
OR 
(substr(pert_mi, 1,1) IN(1,2))
)
;

-- subquery #2 takes the base query and filters it to only show open calls for papers (i.e., for sidebar item #2) and only Management or Information

SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub2 WHERE 1
AND (((d_abbrev='M' OR d_abbrev='I') AND pert_level IN(1,2)) OR (substr(pert_mi, 1,1) IN(1,2)))
;

SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub3 WHERE 1

-- subquery #3 takes the base query and filters it to only show Workshop-ish types (i.e., for sidebar item #3) and only R:Reservoir

SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub3 WHERE 1

-- subquery #3 takes the base query and filters it to only show Workshop-ish types (i.e., for sidebar item #3) and only H:Health

SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub3 WHERE 1

;

-- subquery #3 takes the base query and filters it to only show Workshop-ish types (i.e., for sidebar item #3) and only I:Information

SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_Sub3 WHERE 1

AND (((d_abbrev='M' OR d_abbrev='I') AND pert_level IN(1,2)) OR (substr(pert_mi, 1,1) IN(1,2)))
;

-- typecode = Sub3; discipline=d
SELECT DISTINCT e_id, hid, code, name as title, detail_url, dt_begins, dt_ends, date_range(dt_begins,dt_ends) as date_span, location_code, location_code_to_formatted(location_code) as location, dt_cfp_ends FROM v_EventsForDisciplines_91118_<viewsuffix> WHERE 1
AND ((d_abbrev=<discipline_code> AND pert_level IN(1,2)) OR (substr(pert_<discipline_code>, 1,1) IN(1,2)))
;

-- this endpoint is for external monitoring 
-- to confirm that our _ds system is working
-- and to confirm its ability to use the EVA connection

SELECT `when` as last_transaction 
FROM `transactions` 
ORDER BY `when` DESC 
LIMIT 1
;

-- this endpoint is for external monitoring 
-- to confirm that our _ds system is working
-- without trying to use any particular database

SELECT NOW() AS dt_now FROM dual
;

-- this endpoint is for external monitoring 
-- to confirm that our _ds system is working
-- and to confirm its ability to use the web_cache connection
-- NOTE: we cannot select the timestamp last modified, because nobody brought it over to this cache, for some reason, and we cannot simply SHOW the UPDATE_TIME on the table because we are using a really old version of InnoDB

SELECT table_rows as rows, data_length
FROM   information_schema.tables
WHERE  TABLE_SCHEMA = 'web_cache' AND TABLE_NAME = 'eva_events'
;

-- 16 = join menu
select * from bootstrap4_nav_sortablenavitem where menu_id = <menu_id>

-- detail of a single section, for use on Section Detail Pages
-- Brett 2019-10-28

SELECT
substring(crm_id,-3) as section_id3, crm_id as section_id7,
-- class_code as entity_type,
name, established_date, url, location, country_code as country_code3, in_santioned_country as is_in_sanctioned_country, is_active
FROM crm_units
WHERE 1
AND class_code ='SECTION'
AND crm_id=SUBSTR( CONCAT("9990", ?), -7)
-- AND lower(name) NOT REGEXP '^disestab|do not use|error|no estab|unassigned|unused|unknown'
LIMIT 1
;

SELECT name, usr_nominee_year as year 
FROM crm_awards
WHERE crm_id = ? and program_type = 'SECTION' 
ORDER BY 
usr_nominee_year desc, -- most recent first
if(id=72488144,1,0) desc, -- presidential awards first
name asc -- alphabetical order
select * from crm_awards limit 100;
select * from crm_countries limit 100
select * from crm_tech_disciplines limit 100
select * from crm_officers limit 10
select * from crm_officers limit 100
select * from crm_regions limit 100
select * from crm_states limit 100
select * from crm_units limit 100;
select * from crm_unit_relationships limit 100;
select * from eva_events limit 10
post_statement:
call eva_events_upsert(
<str:transStatus>,
<int: id>,
<str:code>,
<type_id>,
<type>,
<event_status_id>,
<speaker_names>,
<name>,
<dt_begins>,
<dt_ends>,
<section_id>,
<date_range>,
<time>,
<disciplines_codes>,
<discipline_names>,
<int: cal_region_id>,
<cal_region>,
<location>,
<tz_lookup>,
<location_sort>,
<url>,
<tz_indicator>,
<venue_country_code>,
<cc_code>,
<cc_name>,
<cc_abbrev>,
<city_name>,
<subadmin_name>,
<subadmin_code>,
<keywords>,
<section_title>,
<section_location>,
<schedule_json>,
<web_broadcast_url>,
<web_broadcast_dt>,
<recorded_media_url>,
<recorded_media_publish_dt>,
<cfp_url>,
<registration_url>,
<parent_event_id>,
<bool: hide_from_context_rws>,
<bool: hide_from_context_cal>,
<bool: hide_from_context_mhp>,
<dt_testing>,
<bool:has_child_tc>,
<dt_cfp_begins>,
<dt_cfp_ends>,
<stat_prog_av>,
<bool: has_exhib_opps>,
<bool: has_sponsor_opps>,
<dt_reg_e_begins>,
<dt_reg_e_ends>,
<dt_reg_w_begins>,
<dt_reg_w_ends>,
<venue_name>,
<venue_url>,
<cfp_info_url>
)

select * from regions limit 100
select * from hse_free_papers;
CALL test_sas_proc('')
CALL test_sas_proc('20ATCE')

-- CALLPROC test_sas_proc2(1,2,0)
-- testing calling proc passing params
CALLPROC test_sas_proc2(<id>,2,0)

-- test value='2020-04-24'
select id, dt_modified from events
[where dt_modified < <modified_before>]
order by dt_modified desc
limit 10;

-- test value='2020-04-24'
select count(*) from events
[where dt_modified < <modified_before>]
select count(*) from booger2
select id, hid from events limit 10
post_statement:
select id, hid from events
where id=<event_id>

get_statement:
select tc.title, ts.url from spe_training_trainingschedule ts
join spe_training_trainingcourse tc on ts.course_id = tc.id
join spe_training_trainingcourse_disciplines tcd on tc.id = tcd.trainingcourse_id
join mainsite_discipline d on tcd.discipline_id = d.id
where ts.end_date > curdate()
and d.code = <discipline_code>
notes: used on discipline pages to add training courses for that discipline
